summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 187 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 905 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 187.1m lower than yesterday, 28.0m lower than the past week, 904.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 745m to a maximum of 3580m, averaging 1799.3m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1827.3m and 2700m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Light to moderate rain is forecast, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
